channel.title: Client Freezing
channel.description:
Whenever General Graardor tries to use the mage attack thingy, the client freezes up... It does the same thing with the mage in Jad... How do I fix this? I think the error is in the gfx thing...
Please, I need help...

item.title: Client Freezing
item.dc:creator: @huiho huiho
item.description:
@huiho wrote:

npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 1844; hitDiff = 15; plr.stillgfx(444, npcs[NPCID].absY, npcs[NPCID].absX); npcs[NPCID].HP += 60; plr.attackPlayersWithin2(160, 30, 30); plr.playerLevel[5] -= 3; plr.sendQuest("" + plr.playerLevel[5] + "", 4012); } else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1115 && !plr.ProtMelee) {

How do i know which number to put in front of plr.stillgfx(
Its right now stuck on 444, which I did in my server (::gfx 444)
And my client froze, so which number do I put in front of there?

EDIT: I just checked my other server files, where it doesnt freeze up, and its the exact same thing… Is like my gfx 444 missing or something?

Read full topic

item.title: Client Freezing
item.dc:creator: @Valentine1 Valentine.
item.description:
@Valentine1 wrote:

Search Gen G’s ID in npchandler.java. That’s where the GFX gets selected.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Freezing
item.dc:creator: @huiho huiho
item.description:
@huiho wrote:

[quote=“4markie, post:2, topic:345955”]Yes either it is the GFX it is launching or the emote. Would I would do is see what GFX ID the NPC is trying to do and lauch it using ::gfx and ::emote

If the client freezes up when you play the Emote or GFX yourself, then you’ll see your problem.[/quote]

How do I fix this? Like how would I make the monster do another gfx or emote or whatever? Lots of people on my server were complaining on freezing during GWD, so I need to fix lmfao.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Freezing
item.dc:creator: @4markie 4markie
item.description:
@4markie wrote:

Yes either it is the GFX it is launching or the emote. Would I would do is see what GFX ID the NPC is trying to do and lauch it using ::gfx and ::emote

If the client freezes up when you play the Emote or GFX yourself, then you’ll see your problem.

Read full topic
